data.title: XL Wire Baskets
data.meta-description: New XL Wire Baskets For Sale at ASI, 48 Hr Quick Ship, 20" Deep x 32" Wide x 22" Overall Height, 1/2 Front Drop Gate, Low Price Guarantee and Nationwide shipping on our new wire baskets

div.h3: WorldTainer XL Wire Baskets: Common-Sense, Scalable Bulk Storage
div.p: New XL Wire Baskets For Sale at American Surplus are in stock and ready to ship within 48 hours. These XL wire baskets are the biggest standard size we offer, they measure 40" Deep x 48" Wide and are 42" Overall in Height. They have a high quality electro galvanized finish and are precision welded. As the other wire baskets we offer, they have the traditional 1/2 front drop gate to allow for easy access to your products and materials. The design of these new wire baskets allows them to be collapsed and they can also stack on top of each other. Call our sales team to get a quote today, or you can request a quote online.

American Surplus is proud to carry WorldTainer Wire Containers, the #1-selling wire basket in the world. WorldTainer manufactures each wire container to deliver superior strength, quality, and durability every time. With our factory direct connections and over 25 years of experience, we can pass more savings and quality onto you than anyone else in the industry! Call or request a quote today and see the difference American Surplus and WorldTainer can make for you AND your wallet!

p.strong: Custom designs and finishes are available, talk to our sales team! We can’t list our entire inventory online, if you do not see what you are looking for, just ask! Quantity discounts available on new wire baskets. Call 800-876-3736 for additional information & a free quote. Nationwide shipping is available. Price and product availability subject to change without notice. Inventory is subject to prior sale.
